text:
Hi Guys hope you're well ok I'm gonna give
you a recipe for a very simple unbelievably

delicious 100 calorie snack it's pop corn
it's normally cooked in butter or fat so saturated

fats go through the roof so you've taken something
that's healthy made it unhealthy straight

away then there's all the sauce and the toffee
and that's lovely I love it, you love it,

but that's a treat, this is a healthy snack
so first up let's just get the recipe it's

really complicated, medium pan on a medium
heat put it on cold and one heaped tablespoon

of corn and a little bit more because this
is about 76 calories so I put a bit more in

so it's 100 just like that shake it flat in
a pan that will pop into a massive bowl of

lovely hot steaming popcorn, if you look in
there now it's just starting to pop and we

can kind of flavour that in many many different
ways so my favourite is marmite it just works

really well it kind of clings to it a little
teaspoon of this and it's really really good

worcestershire sauce is very good, chili sauce
is very nice but you might be able to have

fun with your own if it's too wet it'll make
it soggy so you need something that's got

a bit of kind of texture to it in our bowl
of popcorn here let's just get that ready

it's all popped now I'm just gonna go in with
a teaspoon of marmite and move it about you

don't wanna put loads and loads of marmite
in so it gets too salty you can see look it's

just soft of sticks it together move it around
it's so bloomin' quick me and the kids love

it that is actually for one person that's
a lot of stuff right there delicious a brilliant

trick to have up your sleeve, in my opinion
it's snacking that really helps people go

over the edge in sort of calories and put
on the weight and then get in trouble but

we like a snack so I'm not saying take away
the things that you love I'm just saying if

you keep going to them every single time it
probably will become a problem so guys thank

you if you haven't subscribed to Food Tube
click the link up here because it's free and

we want you to cook gorgeous gorgeous things
at home this recipe, although it's not really

a recipe is it, is from my cookbook every
day superfood that's breakfast lunches dinners

drinks and snacks this was one of the superfood
snacks I hope you like it give us some comments

in the comments box below and until next time
lots of love guys bye!
